Our more than 20 years of experience as wholesalers gives us access to the best and most profitable brands in the national sports world, providing our clients with the highest quality advice. In 1999, the POINT SPORT Shopping Group was born, being one of the national reference groups according to the sports magazine CMD (Correo del Mercado Deportivo) which places us as the sixth National operator.

One of our basic principles in the purchasing group POINT SPORT is to make things easy, and for this we have negotiated the best conditions with more than 50 sports providers that will provide you with the most adequate product and with the best conditions necessary to carry out your favorite sport.
We currently have 132 establishments with 107 associates distributed in 112 cities throughout Spain.
